title: Two rhenium compounds with benzimidazole ligands: synthesis and DNA interactions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19787-19793
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02669A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Nataliia Shtemenko, Cristina Galiana-Rosello, Ariadna Gil-Martínez, Salvador Blasco, Jorge Gonzalez-García, Helen Velichko, Oleksandr Holichenko, Olexandr Shtemenko, Enrique García-España
Two rhenium compounds with benzimidazole showed strong emission, selectively stabilized G4-quadruplexes, accumulated in cancer cells and influenced on their morphology. In silico approach was used to show the possible binding activity.
